name: PulseWaveVelocity
title: Pulse Wave Velocity
description: The distance traveled between two arterial pulse measurement sites divided by the time it takes for a single pulse wave to travel between the two sites (Business ID: Entry 4024676)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Pulse Wave Velocity.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an the distance traveled between two arterial pulse measurement sites divided by the time it takes for a single pulse wave to travel between the two sites.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Pulse Wave Velocity.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Pulse Wave Velocity.)
